alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Custer; Greer; Roger Mills; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Washita, southeastern Roger Mills, western Custer, north central Greer and Beckham Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1159 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cheyenne to 4 miles east of Sayre to 5 miles south of Mangum. Movement was northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elk City, Sayre, Cheyenne, Burns Flat, Sentinel, Hammon, Dill City, Canute, Butler, Carter, Rocky, Foss, Strong City, Retrop, Delhi, Foss Reservoir, Moorewood, Berlin, and Stafford. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 13 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Beckham; Custer; Greer; Roger Mills; Washita
